channel.title: Papers on Owen F. Davis
channel.description: Recent content in Papers on Owen F. Davis

item.title: Older Workers and Employer-Sponsored Health Insurance Premiums: Evidence From Linked Administrative and Survey Data
item.description: This study explores the relationship between employer age structure and health insurance premiums using administrative data.

item.title: How Does the Earned Income Tax Credit Work? Exploring the Role of Commuting and Personal Transportation
item.description: This paper uses a simulated instrument approach to explore the personal transportation and commuting mechanism behind the Earned Income Tax Credit.

item.title: How did COVID-19 affect the labor force participation of older workers in the first year of the pandemic?
item.description: This paper uses the Current Population Survey to study older workers' transitions out of employment and into retirement during the first year of the pandemic.

item.title: Employment and retirement among older workers during the Covid-19 pandemic
item.description: This paper provides a comprehensive examination of employment and retirement transitions among older workers during the Covid-19 pandemic.
